Electronic Team, Inc

 
 

MacDroid

An app that easily
connects Android to Mac

 

MacDroid is one of the few apps that can easily transfer files between Android and Mac, letting you access and manage files in the Finder without the necessity of having any third-party apps on your Android device.
 
Download for Free
 
Requires macOS 10.10 and higher;
Compatible with all Android and MTP devices.
 
 

Mount Android
as disk on Mac

 

With MacDroid you can easily connect any Android or MTP device to your Mac and manage its content directly in the Finder. MacDroid gives you access to both — internal and external — storages of Android.

 
 

Transfer any type of files between Mac and Android

 

MacDroid can transfer any type of files between your Mac and Android — pictures, videos, music, separate files or even entire folders.

 
 

Special offer

 

Celebrate this release with us! You are welcome to get MacDroid PRO subscription with a special 50% discount: your 1st year of using MacDroid for just $9.99!

 
Try PRO
 

Free version allows transferring data from Android to Mac only, while PRO transfers data in both directions — from Mac to Android and from Android to Mac

 
 
 

Connect other MTP
devices

 

Additionally to Android devices, MacDroid allows you connecting any MTP devices to your Mac and transferring files between them.

 
 
MacDroid

Transfer files between Mac and Android within a couple of clicks

 

It’s up to you - to try PRO version or to stay with MacDroid Free — in both cases you’ll be satisfied with the functionality MacDroid offers.

 
Download for Free
 
Requires macOS 10.10 and higher;
Compatible with all Android and MTP devices.
